text:
Hi,

I'm trying to run FOP using java and getting the exception "Error : 
javax.xml.transform.Transformer" when i invoke the 'run()' method of 'starter'. 
The parameter i passed is "-xsl xml2pdf.xsl -xml xslforef.xml -pdf 
xslforef.pdf". The xsl and xml files are present in the folder where my java 
source presence. What could be the problem and where do i have to look for the 
information? It would be really helpfull if you could provide these info.

Thanks,
Vijay.
creator: vijaysudhakar@hotmail.com

text: The most likely reason is a classpath or deployment mistake.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
